thread.title: Man struck and killed by semi-truck on I-205 northbound
thread.title_full: Man struck and killed by semi-truck on I-205 northbound

author: Andrew Theen | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Man struck and killed by semi-truck on I-205 northbound
text:
Man struck and killed by semi-truck on I-205 northbound Portland police siren 
UPDATE: As of 2:45 p.m., Oregon Department of Transportation officials said the northbound freeway closure was expected to last for several more hours. 
A man was struck and killed on Interstate 205 northbound near Powell Boulevard Sunday afternoon, police said. 
Officers responded to the highway at 12:36 p.m. and found a man deceased in the roadway. 
Early information indicates the man had pulled his car out of traffic lanes and was struck and killed by a semi-truck when he stepped out of the vehicle. 
The truck operator stopped and is cooperating with law enforcement, according to a press release. 
All I-205 northbound traffic is being diverted at the Foster Road exit and northbound cars are being allowed back on the freeway at Powell Boulevard. 
This post will continue to be updated. 
-- Andrew Theen
